text:
can see that a conﬁguration of [12, 100, 50, 1, 12] achieved an RMSE of 21.24, which is
skillful as compared to a naive forecast model that achieved 50.70. The model requires a lot
more tuning and may do much better with a hybrid conﬁguration, such as having a CNN model
as input. We can unpack this conﬁguration as:
 n input: 12
 n nodes: 100
 n epochs: 50
 n batch: 1
 n diff: 12
A truncated example output of the grid search is listed below.
